features: Stepless Dimming Mode: The desk light offers effortless switching of color temperatures (2700K-6500K) and stepless dimming (1% - 100%) to meet your arbitrary color temperature and brightness needs, providing you with a healthy and comfortable office lighting experience. It is perfect for you and your child to read, work, study, unwind, draw, knitting, sew, craftwork, etc.

360° Adjustable & Long Flexible Gooseneck: The long flexible gooseneck with 360° adjustable, easy adjustment to your preferred position, giving you full control over the direction of light. Our LED table lamp is made of aluminum and ABS material for excellent heat dissipation and a long lifespan of up to 60,000 hours. Additionally, the office lamp includes a built-in wire management feature, allowing you to neatly collect and conceal the wires, ensuring a clean and organized desk setup.

Big Size & Fit Models: Our table lamp features a 17-inch extra-wide lamp bar that can fully light up your workspace, providing you with enough brightness to complete any task. It is suitable for a maximum work height of about 31 inches, making it compatible with 30-inch monitors (backward compatible with 29-inch, 27-inch, 24-inch, and other monitors). Office desk lamp with easy installation and an adjustable metal clamp design, the sturdy metal clips can support desktops up to 2.36 inches thick.

Energy Saving & Eye Care: Our eye care light is composed of 100 high-quality lamp beads, it consumes a remarkable 85% less energy than traditional incandescent lamps. This clip lamp experience uniform brightness, a wide lighting range, and an absence of bothersome strobes, blue light hazards, and glare. Our lamp emits soft, eye-friendly light that safeguards your eyesight and minimizes eye fatigue even during extended periods of use.

Reliable USB Adapter & Customer Service: To ensure a seamless experience, office desk lamp come with a complimentary 5V/3A reliable adapter, providing you with everything you need right out of the box. The package includes: 1x Eye-caring Desk Lamp, 1x Metal Clamp, 1x Power Adapter(5V/3A), 1x User Manual. Each desk lamp includes a 2 years warranty, our dedicated customer support team is here to assist you promptly and effectively.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our LED desk lamp protects the eyes of people who work and read for long periods from harm. No glare, No flickering, No ultraviolet rays, No frequency radiation.
Previous page Next page 1 Multiple Lighting Modes 2 Wide Coverage 3 Eye Protection 4 Simple Installation

360° Free Rotation Lamp Holder Provides wider and greater lighting coverage, the direction of the light canbe adjusted freely. One Button Operation Touch Lightly: ON/OFF or switch the light color. Long press: Adjust the brightness. 360° Adjustable Gooseneck Rotatable neck easily adjuststhe light to the desired angle. Simple Installation Flexible adjustable clip design, which can support up to the desk thickness of 2.36 inches.

This LED desk lamp can be fixed at any position you desire, making it highly suitable for large workbenches and drafting desks. It provides ample and comfortable lighting for your work at home, studying, drawing, reading, sewing, and crafting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lamp! Would Recommend!
reviews.reviewText: I got this lamp for Christmas from my husband and I love it! The set up was simple, it attached easily to my desk, and it is very bright like I need it to be to see the project I’m working on. If you don’t need it super bright, it has other options to fit your needs! The top bends as well so it’s very adjustable so once it’s clipped it still can be moved around to get different lighting on areas you need it. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this light for use at my desk. I work from home and the lighting where I am set up isn't great. This light truly impressed me! It's larger than I imagined yet takes up zero space, adjustable, and has multiple light settings which is great depending on the time of day! The easy to use power button is sensitive which i prefer and i dont have to go under my desk to turn it on as its right on my desk!!! The lower price point was a win as well! Easy to install and use! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for my desk in my craft room! It is the perfect amount of light and it casts minimal shadow on my workspace while I'm working. I love the flexibility of the post and the light fixture itself. I can adjust the light to the perfect spot on my desktop and because of it's sleek design, the lamp doesn't impede my vision as I'm working.It has more than enough of a cord for plugging in.I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great desk lamp
reviews.reviewText: I really like the 3 lighting choices and the construction of the lamp. It attaches to my desk easily and provides excellent light without taking up hardly any space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these lights...and I'm picky
reviews.reviewText: tall enough to reach over the monitor and cast NO glow on the screen but lots of glow on the desktop (useful for someone who handwrites a lot, and loses things a lot.Very sleek and unobtrusive, The flex in the neck is just right. The button is accessible if you wrap the cord around your monitor stand or secure it some other way. The cord has a USB connector AND comes with a wall adapter you can plug in if you want (I have mine going into a USB hub).The three light colors are good. I THOUGHT it wasn't dimmable but it is! Long-press on the button. Awesome. (I just discovered this while writing this review!)Pleasantly surprised and glad I bought two.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Barely Tall Enough, Sturdy, Works Perfectly, Button Needs to Be On the Device
reviews.reviewText: Great lamp, and very versatile. Seems to be just barely tall enough to go above my raised monitors (on monitor arms), so I wish it was a couple inches taller and height-adjustable (yes, you can bend it, but it's long). The brightness is high enough to be very useful and not blinding, as well as almost infinitely adjustable. In fact, with the three light color modes (cool white, warm white, and white) that can be adjusted individually and it will remember them even when it's off, as long as it stays plugged in.It was easy to put together (took about 1 minute, as everything just screws into each other and you just need to pull the cable through the middle piece until the lamp itself can be screwed into the top of it. You have the choice to plug this directly into a USB port, as I have or you can use the power adapter that came with it to plug it into the wall.It's a great product, especially for the price. I can see why this would be good for reading, writing or work where you need proper lighting. Yes, it's that bright, but not blinding. I love the adjustability, but wish it had a button that wasn't attached to the cord, as I would prefer to hide the cord. I also wish it could extend at least a few inches more, for my situation. However, I do highly recommend this lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars #1 Amazon Purchase of 2023!
reviews.reviewText: This light has made such a huge impression! It is perfect on my sewing table, lighting my machines. I could never afford the expensive $300 sewing lights. when I saw this light for the price I thought - let me give it a whirl! well the impact it’s had has been perfect! I can’t believe the improvement it’s had in my space. Love the different settings- OMG! Minutes to put together. It also isn’t bulky, or ugly to look at. It looks modern and sleek & isn’t a space hog. I bought this and didn’t have to spend a fortune on those overpriced craft table lights (oh, you know that brand). THIS IS MY BEST AMAZON PURCHASE OF 2023!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a light so I could work on my school work while everyone in the house sleeps (that’s the only time I can get anything done) if you know you know! I came across several light but I wanted a pink one and I needed one big enough to light up my whole desk and this one does the job exceptionally well! It has 3 settings a very bright light, warm tone, and moderate bright! In the pictures I posted it’s on the very bright which is the first setting! Installation was literally a breeze I put it together in minutes like 3 minutes honestly they are precise and easy to follow. Get this light you won’t be disappointed!
